app_descript:
App Name: Funny Camera
Package Name: com.okcamera.funny

Brief:

Funny Camera is a delightful and interactive photo capturing and editing app designed to bring a new level of fun and creativity to your photography. With a variety of engaging features from automatic background cutout to a plethora of stickers and seals for your selfies, this app reimagines photo taking and editing. Get ready to transform your photos into amusing masterpieces!
